pokemon.name: Electrode
pokemon.flavorText: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.

pokemon.name: Exeggcute
pokemon.flavorText: Often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather and attack in swarms.

pokemon.name: Exeggutor
pokemon.flavorText: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an EXEGGCUTE.

pokemon.name: Cubone
pokemon.flavorText: Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has ever seen this POKéMON's real face.

pokemon.name: Marowak
pokemon.flavorText: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.

pokemon.name: Hitmonlee
pokemon.flavorText: When in a hurry, its legs lengthen progressively. It runs smoothly with extra long, loping strides.

pokemon.name: Hitmonchan
pokemon.flavorText: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning fast volleys that are impossible to see.

pokemon.name: Lickitung
pokemon.flavorText: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon's. It leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.

pokemon.name: Koffing
pokemon.flavorText: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning.

pokemon.name: Weezing
pokemon.flavorText: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, 2 KOFFINGs can fuse into a WEEZING over many years.

pokemon.name: Rhyhorn
pokemon.flavorText: Its massive bones are 1000 times harder than human bones. It can easily knock a trailer flying.

pokemon.name: Rhydon
pokemon.flavorText: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees.

pokemon.name: Chansey
pokemon.flavorText: A rare and elusive POKéMON that is said to bring happiness to those who manage to get it.

pokemon.name: Tangela
pokemon.flavorText: The whole body is swathed with wide vines that are similar to sea­ weed. Its vines shake as it walks.

pokemon.name: Kangaskhan
pokemon.flavorText: The infant rarely ventures out of its mother's protective pouch until it is 3 years old.

pokemon.name: Horsea
pokemon.flavorText: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.

pokemon.name: Seadra
pokemon.flavorText: Capable of swim­ ming backwards by rapidly flapping its wing-like pectoral fins and stout tail.

pokemon.name: Goldeen
pokemon.flavorText: Its tail fin billows like an elegant ballroom dress, giving it the nickname of the Water Queen.

pokemon.name: Seaking
pokemon.flavorText: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming power­ fully up rivers and creeks.

pokemon.name: Staryu
pokemon.flavorText: An enigmatic POKéMON that can effortlessly regenerate any appendage it loses in battle.

pokemon.name: Starmie
pokemon.flavorText: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.

pokemon.name: Mr-mime
pokemon.flavorText: If interrupted while it is miming, it will slap around the offender with its broad hands.

pokemon.name: Scyther
pokemon.flavorText: With ninja-like agility and speed, it can create the illusion that there is more than one.

pokemon.name: Jynx
pokemon.flavorText: It seductively wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.

pokemon.name: Electabuzz
pokemon.flavorText: Normally found near power plants, they can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.
